ProjectTitle: Optimizing outbreak data management tools using epidemiological and genomic data collected during the COVID-19 pandemic, and integrating artificial intelligence tools to allow for monitoring the evolution of an outbreak in real time
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/07/2023
In your abstract I can see that you are also generating certain data yourself, so list those also in the Research Data Summary, namely:
1. determinants of spreading events in this community
2. decision model to identify behavioral, social, immunological and chronological risk factors for SARS-CoV-2 infection
If any further software is developed, also include that.

Then also describe how these data / model / software will be documented, stored, archived, shared, etc.
label: good with suggestions
